org.joone.edit
Class DelegationSelectionTool

java.lang.Object
  CH.ifa.draw.standard.AbstractTool
      CH.ifa.draw.standard.SelectionTool

              org.joone.edit.DelegationSelectionTool
All Implemented Interfaces:
CH.ifa.draw.framework.Tool
public class DelegationSelectionTool
extends CH.ifa.draw.contrib.CustomSelectionTool

Delegate mouse selection to a specific TextTool if the figure selected inside a CompositeFigure is a TextFigure

deactivate

public void deactivate()
Terminates the editing of a text figure.

setTextTool

protected void setTextTool(CH.ifa.draw.figures.TextTool newTextTool)
Set the text tool to which double clicks should be delegated. The text tool is shared by all figures upon which this selection tool operates.

Parameters:
newTextTool - delegate text tool

getTextTool

protected CH.ifa.draw.figures.TextTool getTextTool()
Return the text tool to which double clicks are delegated. The text tool is shared by all figures upon which this selection tool operates.

Returns:
delegate text tool
